alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coweta; Heard (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 10:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carroll, northeastern Heard and northwestern Coweta Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1031 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Plant Yates, or 9 miles northwest of Newnan, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Whitesburg, Roopville, Plant Yates, Lowell, Plant Wansley, Arnco-Sargent, Powers Crossroads, Handy and Clem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
